DOC.brief_summary: The goal of the study is to determine the impact of procalcitonin (PCT)-guided therapy on duration of antibiotic therapy in critical care unit (CCU) patients with suspected pneumonia at Mayo Clinic Health System Eau Claire.
DOC.brief_title: Procalcitonin Use in Pneumonia Patients in the Critical Care Setting
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criteria: 18 years old admitted to critical care unit placed on pneumonia protocol Exclusion criteria: patients who received outpatient antibiotic therapy within previous 21 days
